mapper.select: SELECT lo.application_no, lo.loan_application_no, lo.model, sum(lo.principal) principal, sum(lo.service_fee) serviceFee, sum(lo.xxt_fee) xxtFee, sum(lo.geex_fee) geexFee, sum(lo.guarantee_fee) guaranteeFee, sum(lo.other_fee) otherFee, lo.cooperation_code, lo.cooperation_name, lo.`product_code`, lo.`product_name` FROM amp_capital.`loan_order` lo WHERE lo.`payment_time` >= #{startTime} AND lo.`payment_time` < #{endTime} and lo.is_delete = 0 and lo.is_cancel = 0 group by lo.cooperation_code, lo.model, lo.product_code
